熉字的基本解释

熉
yún
黄色：“照紫幄，珠熉黄。”

熉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yún］
［《集韻》于分切，平文，云。］
暗黄色。

熉字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　熉； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页679第09
【集韻】王分切【韻會】【正韻】于分切，?音雲。【集韻】黃貌。【前漢·郊祀歌】照紫幄珠熉黃。【註】師古曰：言光照紫幄，故其珠色熉然而黃也。　又【集韻】羽粉切，音抎。義同。

熉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
熉字的起名意思

黄色。

熉
Basic explanation of words
熉
yún
Yellow: "Photo purple, pearl yellow."
熉
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yún］
["Ji Yun" in split, plain text, cloud. ]
Dark yellow.
熉
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　熉; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 679 09
[Ji Yun] Wang Diqie [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] In Die Rhyme,? Yinyun. 【Ji Yun】Huang appearance. [Pre-Han · Jiao Si Song] According to purple, pearl and yellow. [Note] Shigu said: The light is purple, so the pearl color is yellow but yellow.　[Jiyun] Feather powder cut, sound. The same meaning.
